byline.original: By NICOLE PERLROTH and MICHAEL CORKERY

abstract: New details are reported on pair of related attacks on banks that use Swift message service; attack on Bangladesh Bank, which looted $81 million, and Vietnam bank are seen as part of wide hacking assault on global banking system.
lead_paragraph: The latest target appears to have been in Vietnam, and the intruders used tools similar to those used in a Sony Pictures hacking in 2014.

headline.main: Details Emerge on Global Bank Heists by Hackers
headline.print_headline: Details Emerge on New Attack by Hackers  Aimed at Bank

snippet: The latest target appears to have been in Vietnam, and the intruders used tools similar to those used in a Sony Pictures hacking in 2014.

keywords.value: SWIFT (Society for Worldwide Interbank Financial Telecommunication)
keywords.name: organizations
